name.pehl.piriti.rebind.fieldhandler
Class AbstractConverterFieldHandler

java.lang.Object
  name.pehl.piriti.rebind.fieldhandler.AbstractFieldHandler
      name.pehl.piriti.rebind.fieldhandler.AbstractConverterFieldHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
FieldHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
ConverterFieldHandler, ConverterFieldHandler
public abstract class AbstractConverterFieldHandler
extends AbstractFieldHandler

FieldHandler implementation which uses a Converter from the ConverterRegistry.

$LastChangedRevision: 753 $

$LastChangedBy: harald.pehl $

writeValueAsString

protected void writeValueAsString(IndentedWriter writer,
                                  FieldContext fieldContext)
Converts the FieldContext.getValueVariable() to a String represented by FieldContext.getValueAsStringVariable() using a registered converter. If no converter for FieldContext.getFieldType() was found, toString() will be used.

Parameters:
writer -
fieldContext -
